name: Der Die Das - learn german articles & nouns
description: Der Die Das makes learning German vocabulary, nouns and articles simple and fun using a quiz format. With over 25,000 words and a huge range of categories, were the most comprehensive German articles quiz around!   Frequent repetitions make it easy to memorize the articles & German nouns - conveniently from your couch or whilst on the go. With exercises for beginner and advanced students, Der Die Das provides an easy to use way to improve and practice German.   Having fun is the best way to learn and ensures a successful learning process. That is why the app Der Die Das relies on a simple, playful principle instead of complicated procedures with a dry set of rules.  Die Der Das offers you the best article exercises to make learning German convenient and enjoyable. It includes German vocabulary alongside matching images which help you to internalize the correct German article.  ------------------------------------------------ WHY LEARN WITH DER DIE DAS? ------------------------------------------------  Menu with various vocabulary topics and categories  Create favorites to repeat specific article exercises frequently Receive grammar tips, hints & rules while playing to improve your German  Search in a 25,000 word reference manual  Full offline support  Images to accompany nouns & articles to improve information retention  Learn by listening (Read-aloud function)   Learn & practice the most common German words and the most significant German words as well as articles at no charge (learn German for free)!  For beginners, advanced, kids, adults and all others. Have fun learning!
